title: Add JobPosting JSON-LD structured data to CareersPage

requirements.summary: Inject valid schema.org JobPosting JSON-LD structured data into CareersPage.tsx as a <script type='application/ld+json'> tag
acceptanceCriteria: The rendered DOM of the /careers route contains a <script type='application/ld+json'> element.
The JSON-LD content parses as valid JSON and includes @context, @type, title, hiringOrganization, jobLocation, and datePosted fields.
No other component, page, backend file, or stylesheet is modified.

file_operations.description: Add a <script type='application/ld+json'> tag using dangerouslySetInnerHTML within the component's JSX return. The JSON-LD structured data must include @context (https://schema.org), @type (JobPosting), title (Class A CDL Team Driver â€“ OTR Refrigerated), hiringOrganization with name Supreme Trucking and sameAs supremeltl.com, jobLocation covering nationwide/United States, datePosted with an ISO 8601 date, baseSalary reflecting the CPM pay structure from the existing page content, and applicationContact with telephone (201) 838-0000 ext. 1 and email recruiting@supremeltl.com. Do not alter any existing JSX, styling, or visible content on the page.
